verbs.description: ' The [ARGM-MNR: so] - [V: called] [ARG2: # TrumpDoctrine] is simply bellicose rhetoric strung together with contradictory statements . Bluster is no strategy , Mr. Trump . '
' [ARG1: The so - called # TrumpDoctrine] [V: is] [ARG2: simply bellicose rhetoric strung together with contradictory statements] . Bluster is no strategy , Mr. Trump . '
